snippet: Shares of Sprint were down more than 3 percent in midday trading on Thursday, after Bloomberg News reported that Sprint was weighing a potential challenge to T-Mobile's proposed merger with MetroPCS.
abstract: Shares of Sprint were down more than 3 percent in midday trading on Thursday, after Bloomberg News reported that Sprint was weighing a potential challenge to T-Mobile's proposed merger with MetroPCS.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Sprint Shares Fall on Report of Possible Counterbid for MetroPCS
